ValidationRule.description: Projects that are non billable (billable checkbox unchecked) time credited is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(pse__Is_Billable__c), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "In Progress"), NOT(pse__Time_Credited__c), CreatedDate >= DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(TODAY()) & " 00:00:00") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Time Credit "True" required for non-billable projects.
